tracks.text: A dirigible balloon carries a nordic style house on a boat through the clouds.
A ball of fire streaks through the air
5 men in black and white run out of the house, up the bow of the ship. The first one looks through a telescope.
He looks at the flaming ball as it crashes into a snowy field
The men wear black and white face paint. They have dark black hair and wear black coats.
They approach the large, 3 story tall rock in the snow.
The rock cracks
The front man stares through a crack
The rock explodes, knocking the men back. In the center stands a woman wearing a dress of billowing, rainbow feathers
She has golden lips, with red and blue feathers surrounding her eyes. Her face is a mix of white, yellow, blue, and brown.
The flying ship lurches forward. The woman floats behind the 5 men, standing on the bow.
They fly through the clouds across valleys steepled with mountains that resemble statues of monsters.
A large black bird approaches, and grabs the dirigible in its talons. The bird's head is the size of the entire boat.
The bird squeezes the air out of the balloon and drops the boat. The woman flies up to the bird, level with its eyes.
She shouts, shooting light from her mouth. It travels into the bird, and the bird explodes in blue fire.
The ship dangles from a tree limb.
The front man swings a grappling hook around his head.
He tosses it, and it lands in the mouth of a cave resembling a monster's mouth.
The men swing along the rope, across a wide chasm.
The woman floats behind them.
The men walk through the cave. Bats swarm them, until all they can see is black.
White snow pushes away the black, and the men walk through a field in a blizzard.
They look up. A large, black furry monster approaches and shouts. The men fly back.
It steps again.
The woman flies up and shouts a ball of fire into the monster's mouth. The monster explodes.
The men walk through snow, surrounded on both sides by boulders, where gargoyles perch and stare down at them.
The men walk through snowy woods, where black whisps wander around them.
They walk by a river. Mountains billow smoke in the distance. The woman floats behind them.
The snow beneath them cracks and gives way.
The men sink into water.
Black and white zebra fish swim past them.
A zebra print shark swims by. The front man looks around.
The other men float nearby
A tentacle grabs the front man and pulls him away.
A giant, gray octopus like monster with teeth and thorns pulls the front man closer. The woman shoots the monster, and it explodes.
An iceberg emerges from the sea during a storm. The men ride the iceberg as the woman floats behind them.
Lightning crashes in the distance. The iceberg rocks, then launches into the air, through the clouds.
Birds trailing golden light fly around them.
Purple lightning rumbles from a cloud, seen through a telescope.
Smoke rises behind a cloud as dazzling blue and purple light glows
A giant ram with 5 eyes, fangs the size of men, and golden horns rises from the clouds. Its body is made of billowing, rainbow feathers.
The men stare up at the beast.
The woman lifts her blue eyes up to the beast and smiles widely.
She rises slowly to eye level.
She smiles, glowing, in the center of the beasts forehead.
The beast's horns form a heart above its head. It stretches out thorny, snake skinned arms, revealing layers of billowing rainbow feathers. The men stare ass the beast fills the sky.
